languages.text: Причудливая скульптура издает едва слышный звук... отдаленно напоминающий болезненный стон.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Узнали что-то новое о происхождении необычных статуй

languages.text: The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a pained moan.
languages.original_text: Причудливая скульптура издает едва слышный звук... отдаленно напоминающий болезненный стон.

traits.locale_text: The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a painful moan.
The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a painful moan.
The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a pained moan.
The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a pained moan.

languages.text: La sculpture émet un son à peine perceptible... qui ressemble vaguement à un gémissement de douleur.
languages.original_text: The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a pained moan.

traits.locale_text: La sculpture émet un son à peine perceptible... qui ressemble vaguement à un gémissement de douleur.

languages.text: 这尊古怪的雕塑发出了几乎听不到的声音……类似于痛苦的呻吟。
languages.original_text: The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a pained moan.

traits.locale_text: 这尊古怪的雕塑发出了几乎听不到的声音……类似于痛苦的呻吟。

languages.text: この奇妙な彫刻から、わずかに苦しげなうめき声にも似た音が聞こえてくる。
languages.original_text: The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a pained moan.

traits.locale_text: この奇妙な彫刻から、わずかに苦しげなうめき声にも似た音が聞こえてくる。

languages.text: Die bizarre Skulptur mach ein kaum hörbares Geräusch ... was dich vage an ein schmerzerfülltes Stöhnen erinnert.
languages.original_text: The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a pained moan.

traits.locale_text: Die bizarre Skulptur mach ein kaum hörbares Geräusch ... was dich vage an ein schmerzerfülltes Stöhnen erinnert.

languages.text: La estrafalaria escultura emite un sonido casi inaudible... que se parece a un gemido de dolor.
languages.original_text: The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a pained moan.

traits.locale_text: La estrafalaria escultura emite un sonido casi inaudible... que se parece a un gemido de dolor.

languages.text: Tuhaf heykelden zar zor duyulabilen bir ses çıkıyor. Acılı bir inlemeyi andırıyor sanki.
languages.original_text: The bizarre sculpture emits a barely audible sound... vaguely resembling a pained moan.

traits.locale_text: Tuhaf heykelden zar zor duyulabilen bir ses çıkıyor. Acılı bir inlemeyi andırıyor biraz.
